body.para: Resolution: Not A Problem Fix Version/s: (was: Pending Review)
Read the error message.Your recipient's email address is invalid.

quote.quotepara: Key: STR-3212 URL: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/STR-3212 Project: Struts 1 Issue Type: Bug Components: Website Affects Versions: 1.3.10 Environment: Windows XP,J2SE 1.5 ,Eclipse Galelio IDE Reporter: Umesh Annegirikar

I am working on the healthcare peoject in which the new users are notified by
email for their username and password when user click on the register button All registration is OK but whenever
